name: Evonence
overview:
Evonence is a leading cloud computing product and consulting firm with in-depth expertise in design and development of scalable cloud applications.

Cloud Product: 1: Open source business service cloud: Open Source Business Service Cloud brings the best-in-class open source software products as ready to use solution for building faster, cheaper and better business capabilities for small- and medium-size businesses.

All the leading open source products in the area of wiki, collaboration, CMS, ECM, CRM, ERP, project management, code repository, E-learning, E-commerce, etc. are made available as pre-configured, pre-deployed ready-to-use-solution. Sample product list includes OpenBravo, OranageHRM, SugarCRM,Redmine, Twiki, Drupal, Alfresco, Sakai, Docuwiki,Subversion, Vtiger, Opentaps, Joomla, etc.

Consulting Services:

2: Cloud Migration: Migration of custom applications to leading public clouds like Amazon AWS, Microsft Azure, Google Apps

3: Cloud Integration

4: Cloud app development and maintanence
